question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: We offer full refunds within 30 days of purchase for any reason. After 30 days, refunds are issued on a case-by-case basis. To request a refund, contact our support team with your order number.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'Orders' page. Alternatively, check your email for a tracking link that was sent when your order shipped. If you have any issues, contact support.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach our customer support team via email at support@example.com, by phone at 1-800-123-4567, or through the chat widget on our website. We're available Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm EST.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All transactions are secure and encrypted.
